attributes.action: Actually act on one of these petitions instead of sending us pitiful excuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned have voted for many of these online petitions. We have had many responses from the PM and the PM's office. Not once have we seen any kind of reasonable comeback. Instead, all we see is more side-stepping of real issues. We would like to see a positive action from the PM's office and not poor excuses and non-answers for the issues that british citizens have flagged as important issues that shape our daily lives for the better and would make stand a chance of making a difference in the UK.
